seo: Bazarr,swaggerui,任意文件读取漏洞,漏洞检测
summary: 检测Bazarr应用中的swaggerui任意文件读取漏洞，通过发送特定HTTP请求来验证是否存在该漏洞并输出相关信息。
summary_en: Detect the swaggerui arbitrary file read vulnerability in Bazarr application. It verifies the existence of the vulnerability by sending a specific HTTP request and outputs relevant information.
